data.enText: bad or criminal behaviour, usually of young people
data.chText: （常指青年人的）犯罪，违法行为

tr: an antisocial misdeed in violation of the law by a minor
a tendency to be negligent and uncaring
example: he inherited his delinquency from his father
his derelictions were not really intended as crimes
his adolescent protest consisted of willful neglect of all his responsibilities

tr: nonpayment of a debt when due

example.ex: He had no history of delinquency.
...a whole range of crimes and delinquencies.

value.def: Delinquency is criminal behaviour, especially that of young people.
value.tran: (尤指青少年的)违法行为，犯罪行为

example.ex: Not all delinquencies lead to foreclosure.
example.tran: 并不是所有未按时还债的情形都会导致丧失抵押品的赎回权。
抵押贷款拖欠率的上升

value.def: Delinquency is failure to pay a debt or tax.
value.tran: 逾期未还债务（或未缴税款）
